    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>

          </identifier>
          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Verb - Perfect Tense 2</string>
            <string language="en">Verbs - Perfect Tens 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verben - Vollkommene 10 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Verbes - Dix Parfaits 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Verbos - Dez Perfeitos 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Verbi - Dieci Perfetti 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ρήματα - τέλειες δεκάδες 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Verbos - Diez Perfectos 2</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Complete the text by writing the correct perfect tense form of the given words. You practise verb forms at the same time as you learn a little about Galway in Ireland.Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 5 - Who Are You?</string>
            <string language="en">Complete the text by writing the correct perfect the form of the given words. You practice verb forms at the same time as you learn a little about Galway in Ireland. Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 5 - Who Are You?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">English</string>
            <string language="sv">language</string>
            <string language="sv">verb</string>
            <string language="sv">perfect tense</string>
            <string language="sv">Ireland</string>
            <string language="en">Sapphire</string>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="en">language</string>
            <string language="en">verb</string>
            <string language="en">perfect's</string>
            <string language="en">Ireland</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Führen Sie den Text, indem Sie das korrekte 
schreiben, vervollkommnen das Formular der gegebenen Wörter durch. 
Sie üben Verbformulare, zur gleichen Zeit wie Sie wenig über 
Galway in Irland erlernen. Safir - Englisch und Berufsleben für
Anfänger - Modul 5 - die Sie sind?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Remplissez le texte en écrivant le correct 
perfectionnent la forme des mots donnés. Vous pratiquez des 
formes de verbe pendant que vous apprenez au sujet de Galway en 
Irlande. Safir - l'anglais et vie active pour les débutants - 
module 5 - qui sont vous ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Termine o texto escrevendo o correto aperfeiçoam 
o formulário das palavras dadas. Você pratica formulários do 
verbo ao mesmo tempo que você aprende um pouco sobre Galway em 
Ireland. Safir - vida do inglês e de funcionamento para os 
novatos - módulo 5 - que são você?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Completi il testo scrivendo il corretto 
perfezionano la forma di date parole. Vi esercitate nelle forme 
di verbo nello stesso momento in cui imparate un piccolo circa Galway 
in Irlanda. Safir - inglese e vita attiva per i principianti - 
modulo 5 - che sono voi?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συμπληρώστε το κείμενο με το γράψιμο σωστό στον 
τέλειο της μορφής των δεδομένων λέξεων. Ασκείτε τις μορφές
ρήματος την ίδια στιγμή που μαθαίνετε λίγο για galway στην 
Ιρλανδία. Safir - αγγλική και οικονομικά ενεργή ζωή για
τους αρχαρίους - ενότητα 5 - που είναι εσείς;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Termine el texto escribiendo el correcto 
perfeccionan la forma de las palabras dadas. Usted practica 
formas del verbo al mismo tiempo que usted aprende un poco sobre 
Galway en Irlanda. ¿Safir - inglés y vida laboral para los 
principiantes - módulo 5 - que son usted?</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Saphir</string>
          </keyword>
